txt.en: 'So you wish to explore the Bonevales? I do not know why you would go to such a place. I hear that only the wicked roam those lands, but I have never been there myself.\n\n'You can reach the Bonevales by travelling south on the main road through Enedwaith, through the Lichbluffs. At least, that is what the Elder told me.'
'A duvodiad in these lands? Who goes there? Why are you in this forsaken place?'
'If you take the main through-way south from Enedwaith, I am sure you will find the Bonevales without a problem.'
'What do you want here, traveller? Why should the White Hand grant you admittance?\n\n'I'm not sure I like the way you're looking at me, [placeholder].'
The Bonevales are in the northern reaches of Dunland.
Find a friendly face in the Bonevales
The Bonevales are in the north of Dunland, south of the Lichbluffs in Enedwaith.\n\nYou should follow the road south from the Lichbluffs and seek any friendly inhabitants of the Bonevales.
